entries.femaleVariant: Only affects Pistols, SMGs, Precision Rifles, Revolvers, Sniper Rifles, and Shotguns
Only affects Shotguns, Revolvers, Sniper Rifles, Assault Rifles, LMGs and HMGs
Only affects Assault Rifles, LMGs, HMGs, Pistols, Precision Rifles and SMGs
Only affects LMGs, HMGs and Assault Rifles
Only affects Pistols, SMGs and Precision Rifles
Only affects Revolvers, Shotguns and Sniper Rifles
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% damage</> when outside of Combat. Also provides a preview of estimated damage.

Unlocks <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Focus</> mode. This mode automatically activates when you aim while at full Stamina.

When active:
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Time is briefly slowed</>, allowing for more accurate shots.

When it ends:
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_1} Stamina</>

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Duration:</> {float_0} sec.

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% weapon swap speed</>\n\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_1}% Stamina</> when swapping during combat.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_0}% Firerate</> for semi-automatic weapons.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% crit chance</> decreasing as stamina does.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">No movement speed penalty</> with Heavy Weapons such as Machine Guns and Sniper Rifles.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% Sprint speed</>
Blocking an attack gives:\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% Stamina</> for {float_2} sec.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_0}% incoming ranged damage</> when blocking.
The <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Attack speed</> penalty at low stamina no longer applies to melee weapons.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% melee damage</>.

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% damage</> for the next Quick Melee Attack after shooting an enemy with a heavy semi-auto weapon.\n\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_1}% damage</> for the next heavy semi-auto shot after hitting an enemy with a Quick Melee Attack.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% ammo refill</> after neutralizing an enemy with a heavy automatic weapon.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_0}% Stamina cost</> for attacks with melee weapons.
Unlocks the ability to <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">block incoming projectiles</> with melee weapons. This consumes Stamina.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% attack speed</> with melee weapons.

Swapping light weapons is faster and automatically reloads them.\n\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% fire rate</> after swapping to a light weapon. Normal reloading ends the effect.
